sentence.Network_en: As always, the gin made him shudder and even retch slightly.
sentence.Network_cn: 像往常一样, 他感到一阵哆嗦,甚至有些恶心.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 词汇课堂--新东方词汇完美文本 - 豆丁网 ... pulse 心跳，脉搏 retch 干吐，恶心 wretch 悲惨，不幸的人.
wretched adj. 可怜的;不幸的retch 恶心，干呕stretch 伸展，舒展
香港新闻从业者用语 ... 血糖过高 having blood glucose levels that were too high 作呕 retch 佝偻病 rickets.

list.abs: 热嗽 heat cough热呕 heat retching热呕 heat vomiting热实结胸 heat repletion chest bind.
喜温 that likes warmth喜呕 frequent retching喜梦 frequent dreaming
止嗽散 Cough-Stopping Powder止呕 check retching止呕 check vomiting
乾脆 English, 翻译, 例句, 字典 Chinese... ... 乾涸 to dry up 乾哕 to retch 乾姜 dried ginger.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: variant of dialect reach, from a Germanic base meaning 'spittle'

entry.def: If you retch, your stomach moves as if you are vomiting.

means.word_mean: 1. an involuntary spasm of ineffectual vomiting;
1. eject the contents of the stomach through the mouth;

sentences.sentence: "After drinking too much, the students vomited"
"The patient regurgitated the food we gave him last night"

means.word_mean: 2. make an unsuccessful effort to vomit; strain to vomit

auth_sentence.content: Before he could chew his stomach began to retch drily.
auth_sentence.res_content: Before he could chew his stomach began to retch drily.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Before he could chew his stomach began to retch drily.

auth_sentence.content: I began to...retch and be sick.
auth_sentence.res_content: I began to...retch and be sick.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I began to...retch and be sick.

auth_sentence.content: Mallon led the pickpocket under the awning of a shop and watched him retch dramatically, though without result.
auth_sentence.res_content: Mallon led the pickpocket under the awning of a shop and watched him retch dramatically, though without result.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Mallon led the pickpocket under the awning of a shop and watched him retch dramatically, though without result.

sentences.en: I felt some nausea and retched several times. But I didn’t throw up anything.
sentences.cn: 我感到恶心，干呕了几次，但没吐出什么来。
